```{r func_dates, include = FALSE}
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)


mon <- as_date("2023-10-02")
tues <- mon+days(1)
wed <- mon+days(2)
thur <- mon+days(3)
fri <- mon+days(4)

advdate <- function(day, week) {
  date <- (day + weeks(week))
  dm <- paste(month(date, label = TRUE)," ", day(date)) 
  return(dm)  
}
```
